ProductInfo.Features: Aspect ratio 16:9 - Supports 1080P - Resolution 1366x768 - Analog TV Video System NTSC - Analog TV Sound System M/MTS - Digital TV Tuner ATSC - Digital TV Video System MPEG-2:HL - Digital TV Sound System AC-3 - Multi-Language OSD - V-Chip - Sleep Timer - Built-in Stereo Speakers - Connectors: HDMI Port (HDCP compliance for HDCP content support) - USB Port (Software Updates Only) - AV In (Composite) Port - Component Input - VGA Port - PC Audio Port - Headphone Output - RF (Ant/Cable)- S-Video - AC Power Adapter 100~240V 50-60Hz (UL Approved)- DC 12V Jack - Car Adapter - Remote Control
